greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 if n and d(n) are coprime, 0 otherwise. Here d(n) is the number of divisors of n, A000005.
comment: Equally, a(n) = 1 if and only if n and A049820(n) are coprime.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100000
formula: a(n) = [A009191(n)==1], where [ ] is the Iverson bracket, and A009191(n) = gcd(n,A000005(n)).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 05 2019
